longBusinessSummary: Caplin Point Laboratories Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development, production, marketing, and export of generic pharmaceutical formulations and branded products in India. The company provides tablets, capsules, injections, ophthalmic, liquid orals, softgel capsules, ointments, creams and gels, powder for injections, suppositories, ovules, pre-mix bag formulations, inhalers, and sprays and IV infusion. It also provides dry syrups, lyophilized vials, prefilled syringes, emulsion injection, and topicals. Caplin Point Laboratories Limited was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Chennai, India.
